text: nabivarayā ohugē biriyangen ætæmekuṭa katāvak rahasin kiyū avasthāvē ek biriyaku (an aya veta) eya danvā siṭi kalhi (mesē rahasa heḷidarav vīma) allāh eya nabivarayā veta heḷi kaḷēya. in koṭasak nabivarayā æyaṭa danvā siṭa koṭasak nosalakā hæriyēya. ohu eya æyaṭa danvā siṭi kalhi “meya obaṭa danvā siṭiyē kavudæyi” æya æsuvāya. “abhignānavantavū sarva gnāniyāṇō maṭa dænum dunnēya”yæyi ohu pævasīya
